channel.title: Basketball
channel.description: I was just wondering if people like basketball.

item.title: Basketball
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Eh, I don’t like it, but I don’t hate either.

Read full topic

item.title: Basketball

item.description:

[quote=“dragonus18, post:18, topic:133738”]i only like sports that you actually need muscle to be good at it in basketball all you need ot be able to do is dribble a ball and jump and throw[/quote] What do you bench? like 50LBS?

Read full topic

@aaalba wrote:

i like basketball but HATE BASEBALL!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Basketball
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

jme, I tried hockey several years back(I was maybe 14?) I found it rather boring, watching it on tv is even more boring. If I got the chance to just knock the hell out of people, and not get marked for unsportsmanlike conduct, and removed for the entire season. I may just try it again, but I still don’t like it very much.

Read full topic

item.title: Basketball
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:8, topic:133738”][quote author=cant touch this93 link=topic=184999.msg1676028#msg1676028 date=1187166564]

[quote author=exe626 link=topic=184999.msg1676023#msg1676023 date=1187166381]
Basketball is ok, but I like contact sports more. Wheres the fun when if you almost touch somebody, and get fouled?
[/quote] Obviously you dont play center/forward.
[/quote]I’ve played basketball, I can come close enough to almost touch them, and get fouled. Only thing that comes to mind is punch the ref, but thats unsportsmanlike conduct. I’d rather be able to play more, but I gave up Basketball in the 9th grade.

[quote author=therealjdb link=topic=184999.msg1676029#msg1676029 date=1187166660]
Street basketball is like a contact sport exe, but then again that’s not what he said, but that is what we play.
[/quote]I play streetball down the street from my house. We don’t play with fouls, we knock the hell out of each other ;[/quote]

You should play hockey. When someone pisses you off, you kick their ass(which is allowed). That’s half the fun in hockey.

I don’t like basketball.

Read full topic

item.title: Basketball
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

It’s pretty much who can score the most points in the allotted time, with a few steals here and there.

I much prefer football.

Read full topic

item.title: Basketball
item.dc:creator: @cant_touch_this93 cant touch this93
item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:8, topic:133738”][quote author=cant touch this93 link=topic=184999.msg1676028#msg1676028 date=1187166564]

[quote author=exe626 link=topic=184999.msg1676023#msg1676023 date=1187166381]
Basketball is ok, but I like contact sports more. Wheres the fun when if you almost touch somebody, and get fouled?
[/quote] Obviously you dont play center/forward.
[/quote]I’ve played basketball, I can come close enough to almost touch them, and get fouled. Only thing that comes to mind is punch the ref, but thats unsportsmanlike conduct. I’d rather be able to play more, but I gave up Basketball in the 9th grade.

[quote author=therealjdb link=topic=184999.msg1676029#msg1676029 date=1187166660]
Street basketball is like a contact sport exe, but then again that’s not what he said, but that is what we play.
[/quote]I play streetball down the street from my house. We don’t play with fouls, we knock the hell out of each other ;[/quote] I went to a camp this summer and it was like street. To go in for a layup youd have to run,duck your head, adn hide the ball. Half way in the air some guy nails you too the floor.

Read full topic
